content.rendered:
• This requirement is valid till 03-03-2022
  • Required Skills: Data Center Operator
  • Location: Mumbai
  • Domain: Banking & Financial Services
  • Qualification: Any Degree
  • Experience: 1-2 yrs.
  • Job Description with Roles & Responsibilities:
    Managing Devices and Databases, User Accounts, User Access Rights
  • Database activity monitoring at user, object, transaction, session and archive file levels
  • Database, table-space, data-file, redo log, roll back, striping, spreading, partitioning, archive log management
  • Skillset: Data Center Operator
